nodes.comandosqlorigendash01_99: SELECT 1 as id_record, 2 as Numsecuecial_grupoddatos,3 as Numsecuecial,nombrecolumna,current_date as Created_at,total as Valorcolumna,total as Valoramount  from (SELECT nombrecolumna,sum(Valoramount) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr = '%s' and created_At > (NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hours' ) group by nombrecolumna order by total desc) as buen;
